mapper.select: select * from c_business_front_select_item where id = #{frontSelectItemId} and deleted = false
select * from c_business_front_select_item where pid = #{pid} and deleted = false

SELECT * FROM c_business_front_select_item cbfsi WHERE FIND_IN_SET( cbfsi.id, ( SELECT SUBSTRING( @pid FROM LOCATE(',', @pid) + 1 FOR LENGTH(@pid) ) AS pid FROM ( SELECT u0.id, u0.pid, IF ( FIND_IN_SET(u0.pid ,@pid), @count := @count + 1, 0 ) AS total_childern, IF ( FIND_IN_SET(u0.pid ,@pid), @pid := CONCAT(@pid, ',', u0.id), 0 ) AS childern FROM ( SELECT * FROM c_business_front_select_item fsi WHERE fsi.deleted = FALSE ORDER BY fsi.pid, fsi.id ) u0, ( SELECT @pid := #{pid}) u1, ( SELECT @count := 1) u2 ) u3 LIMIT 1 ) ) ORDER BY cbfsi.sort DESC
